ComplianceCriterion_Description: You and the members of your organization have not employed children below the age of 15

Your member's children below 15 years only help on your member's farm after school or during holidays, the work they do is appropriate for their age, they are supervised and guided by their parent or legal guardian and they do not work for long hours or under dangerous or exploitative conditions
Non-Conformity: on rare occasion, children perform work during non-suitable time
CORRECTIVE MEASURE PROPOSED: written proposal of awareness raising program for all members
OBJECTIVE EVIDENCE: written proposal and additional statement from payroll officer

ComplianceCriterion_Description: You and the members of your organization have not submitted workers less than 18 years of age to any type of work which, by its nature or the circumstances under which it is carried out, is likely to jeopardize their health, safety or morals and their school attendance

If in the past you or your members employed children under 15 for any type of work, or children under 18 for dangerous and exploitative work, you have ensured that those children do not enter or are at risk of entering into even worse forms of labour
Non-Conformity: found indication that children were asked to use machete to clear field
CORRECTIVE MEASURE PROPOSED: database detailing current and past status of children who were working in the past

ComplianceCriterion_Description: You and the members of your organization have implemented procedures to prevent children below the age of 15 from being employed for any work and children below the age of 18 from being employed in dangerous and exploitative work. (Only applies if you have identified child labor as a risk in your organization.)
